scripts.rt:clean: rm -rf dist/application && mkdir -p dist/application/actions/pages-temp && mkdir -p dist/application/web-prod/_next
scripts.rt:dependencies: rm -rf runtime/node_modules && node scripts/copy-dependencies && cd runtime && npm i
scripts.rt:prepare: cp -r .next/standalone/* dist/application/actions/pages-temp/ && cp -r .next/standalone/.next dist/application/actions/pages-temp/.next && cp -r runtime/node_modules/* dist/application/actions/pages-temp/node_modules && cp runtime/index.js dist/application/actions/pages-temp/ && node scripts/copy-env && cp -r public/ dist/application/web-prod/ && cp -r .next/static dist/application/web-prod/_next/static && rm dist/application/actions/pages-temp/server.js
scripts.rt:build: npm run rt:clean && npm run rt:dependencies && npm run rt:prepare && npm run rt:zip
scripts.rt:deploy: aio app deploy --no-actions --no-build && aio app deploy --no-web-assets --no-build
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run rt:build && npm run rt:deploy
